channel.title: How to make server public
channel.description: i need help trying to make my server public. I dont want to make a webclient i just want to make it so i can upload it to megaupload or something like that and have my friends download it and play with me.

item.title: How to make server public
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:420818”][quote author=blakethesnake1 link=topic=523492.msg3807656#msg3807656 date=1320613088]
my client isnt finished. what do i need to do so that it is ready to upload?
[/quote]
Seems what u still want to do to make it finished of course[/quote]
Will you quit posting stupid shit please?

If you need to change your ip than do it in client.java. More than likely your going to need to port forward still. If you already have then just change everything to your name and follow crackhead’s post.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make server public
item.dc:creator: @cr4ckh34d cr4ckh34d
item.description:
@cr4ckh34d wrote:

If your client is finished and ready for uploading right click it and put it into a .rar file then sign up at megaupload.com and just upload the client. Then just put the link anywhere you want to… youtube, forums, etc. Also make sure you have winrar… when you right click your client click “Add to Yourclientname.rar” and your good. Alllssoo make sure you upload the .rar file not your folder.

Read full topic
